General.Name: Edel SE & Co. KGaA
General.Description: Edel SE & Co. KGaA, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a music company in Europe. The company is involved in the production, marketing, and distribution of CDs, DVDs, Blu-rays, and vinyl records. It also publishes and distributes guidebooks, non-fiction, and children's books, as well as magazines, brochures, catalogues, commercial, and multi-media print products and packaging. In addition, the company offers various TV series and film entertainment. Edel SE & Co. KGaA was founded in 1986 and is based in Hamburg, Germany. Edel SE & Co. KGaA operates as subsidiary of Michael Haentjes Vermögensverwaltung- Und Beteiligungsgesellschaft Mbh & Co. Kg
